CalibrationModel.description: radial model, with decentric and affine parameters; there are 12 degrees of freedom: 1 for focal length, 2 for principal point, 2 for distortion centre, 3 for coefficients of radial distortion (r3, r5 r7), 2 for decentric parameters, 2 for affine parameters

Output.description: Optional argument; allows you to choose the name of the output orientation directory, automatically renamed Ori-name of the directory

RegExp.description: Regular Expression referring to the images to process

Timeout.description: integer; expressed in seconds. Avoid to wait undefined time after tapas command execution
